hero.headline: From mirage to community.
hero.subhead: Creating spaces of refuge and renewal where communities find nourishment, belonging, and lasting well-being.

pillars.title: Connection
pillars.description: Fostering meaningful relationships and creating spaces of refuge and renewal where individuals come together to support one another.

pillars.title: Resilience
pillars.description: Strengthening communities through collective wisdom and mutual support, helping people thrive in challenging conditions.

pillars.title: Shared Growth
pillars.description: Creating opportunities for individuals to access resources and transform challenges into opportunities for lasting well-being.

quotes.text: This community gave me purpose again. At 78, I'm still learning and teaching.
quotes.author: Margaret Chen

quotes.text: The wisdom shared here has shaped how I approach challenges in my own life.
quotes.author: David Ochieng
